title: Formula Bounty
author: Formula Bounty
content: ============================== Formula Bounty chat ==============================To participate you need a BSC WalletBOUNTY POOL = Â  8 000 MPY DGTA:â€¢ Telegram â€“ 15%â€¢ Twitter â€“ 20%â€¢ Reddit â€“ 15%â€¢ Blog â€“ 20%â€¢ Youtube â€“ 25%â€¢ Translation â€“ 5%===========================================================================GENERAL TERMS AND CONDITIONS:â€¢Â Â Â If a participant is found to be used ill-practice for any campaign. A participant will be disqualified.â€¢Â Â Â Participants using foul language/funds will be disqualified.â€¢Â Â Â If rules set out in these campaigns are not followed, the participants will not be rewarded accordingly and no negotiation will be entertained.â€¢Â Â Â Disqualified members will lose the entire coins earned and this is irrevocable.â€¢Â Â Â The disqualified member will not be informed. To review your status, please check the Status sheet.â€¢Â Â Â The coins will be distributed at the end of the bounty program.â€¢Â Â Â Submission of work must be provided via the submission form. It is mandatory and the only way for the work results in acceptance. Only submitted work in the submission form will be counted for stakes.â€¢Â Â Â You can keep your work post in this thread (optional) to ensure the bounty claims later along with all other details asked in the submission form (as proof of stakes).â€¢Â Â Â Submit the proof of authentication in the thread whatever campaign you are participating. It is a mandatory option.â€¢Â Â Â We will update the stakes [weekly].Stakes will be paid depending on posts (at the start of the campaign). 5 posts per week: 2 stake 10 posts per week: 3 stake 15 posts per week: 4 stake 20 posts per week: 5 stake25+ posts per week: 6 stake Â Rules: Â 1. You must join the Telegram group: https://t.me/metaplanetary2. You must write at least 5 messages a week about the project (message must relate to the Meta Planetary project) and conduct a dialogue with the participants in the project telegram chat.3. You are not allowed to write a message about the bounty campaign in the chat.4. The words "hi, hello, bye, goodbye, etc." are not counted.5. Participants are prohibited from using any hashtags in the telegram!6. You should not have the name of another project in the profile name.7. Once a week, you must send a report in the form.8. In order to participate you must pass an interview with a bounty manager. Just write to us in telegram (@wehrlein31 and @kateee110)Â Code:Week # : Telegram Profile Link Spreadsheet #: Amount of posts per week:  Stakes will be paid depending on friends/followers (at the start of the campaign).100-300 Followers/Friends: 2 stake per week301-1000 Followers/Friends: 3 stakes per week1001-4000 Followers/Friends: 5 stakes per week4001-10000 Followers/Friends: 6 stakes per week10001+ Followers/Friends: 7 stakes per weekRules:1. You must join Telegram here : https://t.me/metaplanetary2. Each Participant should join the official Twitter: https://twitter.com/Metaplanetary13. Minimum of 100 Follower only can join the Campaign.4. Report should be 5 minimum Retweet and 1 Tweet with the #MetaPlanetary #ICO #CRYPTO #BITCOIN5. Tweet must be at least 50 characters summarizing the project.6. All report must be on time or else you will get 0.7. If you have no new posts from our official Twitter account, kindly make a short post about Meta Planetary and use all of our official hashtag.8. Your privacy settings must be set to public so that we can check your work.Code:Week # :Twitter Profile LinkFollowers:Spreadsheet #:[b]Retweet[/b]1.2.3.4.5.[b]Tweet [/b]1.Stakes will be paid depending on karma (at the start of the campaign).30-60 post karma/ comment karma : 1 stake per week61-100 post karma/ comment karma : 2 stake per week101-300 post karma/ comment karma : 3 stake per week301+ post karma/ comment karma : 4 stake per weekRules:1. We reserve the right to not consider your Reddit account eligible if you are extremely low quality/bot etc.2. Your account must be at least 2 months old and have at least 50 posts or comment karma.3. External posts must link to the Meta Planetarywebsite.4. Posts with negative karma will obviously not be accepted. Any kind of spam will not be rewarded either.5. Your post must be made in one of the following subreddit: r/cryptomoonshots, r/altcoin, r/defi and etc.6. We will award tokens based on the quality of the post. This will be based on the quality of the content, a number of upvotes, karma and how many comments it generates etc. We may take other criteria into account.7. Post must be at least 50 characters summarizing the project.8. You can complete a total of 7 posts per week. A maximum of 2 posts per day.9. Low-quality contents will be denied without pay.10. You must join Telegram here : https://t.me/metaplanetaryCode:Week # : Reddit Profile Link:Carma: Â Spreadsheet #: Links of Reddit posts:1.2.3.4. We divide all kinds of content, including articles, blog posts into 3 categories:Excellent : 36 stakesVery good : 24 stakesGood : 12 stakesRules:1. You can use our official images, logos, graphics on our website.2. Articles should contain at least 500 characters.3. The article or description of the video should contain at least 1 link to our website. At least 1 link to your BTT profile should be indicated in the article or description of the video to prove your authorship.4. Only 5 posts from one user are accepted on the blogging platforms, like "Medium", "Steemit", etc.5. Articles must be interesting and aim to build this project.6. You must join Telegram here :Â  https://t.me/metaplanetaryBest Video: 72 stakesGood Video: 48 stakesMedium Video: 24 stakesLow Video : 12 stakesÂ Rules:1. You must join Telegramhere :https://t.me/metaplanetary[/url2. Video must be 2 minutes long.3. Videos must include link to the official website in the description.4. Must have your BitcoinTalk username in the description.5. Video mustbe published on a crypto related YouTube channel with minimum 150 subscribers.6. Plagiarism or use of other's material will be considered as an invalid submission.7. We would accept any positive video about Meta Planetary, not only about the ICO, but about the idea itself, use cases, benefits, ICO etc.8. No more than two videos from one person.9.The Meta Planetary website should be on the screen of your video. Here is the link to the site: [url=https://www.metaplanetary.io/]https://www.metaplanetary.io/We offer a reward for translating the Website.50 stakes for Website translation, this reservation is valid for 3 days.50 stakes for Whitepaper, this reservation is valid for 10 days.We offer to implement one or more of the following activities in any of the 24 languages listed below:List of languages for translation:Tier 1:- Spanish- Italian- French- Chinese- German- Italian- French- Portuguese- Japanese- KoreanTier 2:- Arabic- Bulgarian- Croatian- Czech- Dutch- Greek- Hebrew- Hindi- Indonesian- Malay- Polish- Romanian- Serbian- Swedish- Thai- Turkish- Vietnamese[color=##3285b9]Rules:[/color]1.Apply only if you are able to provide a high-quality translation in the requested language. Bad quality translations or Google Translate copy-paste will get you disqualified.2.One person can reserve only one language.3.You have 7 days to finish your translation from the moment we approve you. You will get disqualified if you don't respect the deadline.4.A single post dead thread will get you disqualified and you may have a 50% penalty for very rare updates.5.In the course of the translation, some of the information contained in the original document may have been lost, corrupted, or misrepresented. The accuracy of the translation cannot be guaranteed. In the event of any conflicts or inconsistencies between this translation and the official English Whitepaper, the provisions of the English language original shallprevail.6.You may reserve all four or just some of the activities in your language.7.Priority consideration will be given to persons who:Â Â -already participated in the other bounty programs;Â Â -reserve all three activities.8.Wait for your approval in green to begin the work.9.Once you have registered to this campaign, please wait till we contact you. DO NOT start translation before you get our instructions!10.Every translation submitted must include the warning 'Note: This translation has been made independently and any inaccuracies are not the responsibility of Meta Planetary. Please check the original artical for certainty'.11.After filling out the form, write me in PM in telegram (@wehrlein31)=========================WEEK 1 (07.01-13.01)=========================
